snippet.title: Vivaldia II: a new arcade-style game by Vivaldi browser
snippet.description:
We want you to have a good time online. 💻 😎 

So much so, that we've gotten a high-quality #game development team to create an #arcade game for you - Porcelain Fortress.

The awaited sequel to Vivaldia has dinosaurs, robots and the same mighty heroine, who is more determined than ever in her fight against evil. 🦖   
This is our ode to the good old days, when we sat on the floor of the living room to play games in front of the TV. 🕹️

Get it now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2623150/Vivaldia_2/ 🎮 

We hope you enjoy playing it as much as we enjoyed creating it! 👾

Learn more ⬇️ 
https://vivaldi.com/blog/vivaldia-2-game/

Download Vivaldi for Windows, Linux, or macOS: 
▸ https://vvld.in/download 
Vivaldi for Android: 
▸ https://vvld.in/android 
Vivaldi for iOS and iPadOS:
▸ https://apps.apple.com/app/vivaldi-powerful-web-browser/id1633234600

Subscribe to our YouTube channel: 
▸ https://vvld.in/subscribe 
Get the Vivaldi Newsletter ▸ http://vvld.in/newsletter-yt 

Follow Vivaldi: 
▸ Twitter: https://twitter.com/vivaldibrowser 
▸ Reddit: https://reddit.com/r/vivaldibrowser/ 
▸ Mastodon: https://social.vivaldi.net/@Vivaldi
▸ Instagram: https://instagram.com/vivaldibrowser/ 
▸ Facebook: https://facebook.com/vivaldibrowser 
▸ Discord: https://discord.gg/vivaldi-170121320825225218
